article_title: Two charged in fatal Durham shooting
article_text:
You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters

Message: * A friend wanted you to see this item from WRAL.com: http://wral.com/14752331

— Durham police arrested two people late Thursday in connection with a June 26 homicide on Holloway Street.

Christopher Lee Allen, 18, is charged with murder in the death of Anthony Tremaine Glenn, who was found dead in a vehicle that had struck a parked car on Raynor Street near the Holloway Street intersection.

Glenn, 37, was shot after an argument at an AutoZone store on Holloway Street, police said.

Allen was arrested late Thursday at the Budget Inn in Roxboro. Durham police on Thursday also arrested Olga Christina Lopez, 19. She is charged with accessory after the fact to murder and harboring a fugitive.

Allen and Lopez are scheduled to make court appearances July 6.

article_metadata.description: Durham police arrested two people late Thursday in connection with a June 26 homicide on Holloway Street.

Glenn, 37, was shot after an argument at an AutoZone store on Holloway Street, police said.
Allen was arrested late Thursday at the Budget Inn in Roxboro.
Christopher Lee Allen, 18, is charged with murder in the death of Anthony Tremaine Glenn, who was found dead in a vehicle that had struck a parked car on Raynor Street near the Holloway Street intersection.
Durham police on Thursday also arrested Olga Christina Lopez, 19.
She is charged with accessory after the fact to murder and harboring a fugitive.
